title: Hydra
description: Hydra is a package for managing monorepos written in any language.

source.description: The source directory of the project.

build.description: The build directory of the project.

test.description: The test directory of the project.

docs.description: The docs directory of the project.

assets.description: A folder containing assets for the project.

entry.description: The entry point of the project.

outDir.description: The output directory of the project.

moveTopLevelFiles.description: If true, the top level files will be moved to the build directory.

moveSourceFiles.description: An array containing regular expressions to match against source files that shall be moved to the out directory.

strategy.description: The strategy of how to merge the docs directory.

folder.description: The folder to move the docs to.

autoClear.description: If true, the build directory will be cleared before the build process starts.

watch.description: If true, the build process will be executed in watch mode.

ignore.description: An array containing regular expressions to match against files that shall be ignored.
